name: Alabaster Wall
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Its mortar is mixed with waters straight from the Fountain of Cho.

name: Alley Grifters
oracle_text: Whenever Alley Grifters becomes blocked, defending player discards a card.
flavor_text: One distracts the victim, the other extracts the valuables.

name: Ancestral Mask
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other enchantment on the battlefield.
flavor_text: The masks, like the ancient trees they're grown from, lend strength to the dryads.

name: Balloon Peddler
oracle_text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The market festival turned out to be the high point of Jaffy's visit.

name: Battle Rampart
oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

name: Blaster Mage
oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target Wall.
flavor_text: "Don't get up. I'll show myself out."

name: Blockade Runner
oracle_text: {U}: Blockade Runner can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "I need to get back to Mercadia City," said Sisay. "We can get you there," the vizier answered. "Easily."

name: Bog Smugglers
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: They slide over the bog like oil across glass.

name: Bog Witch
oracle_text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text: The world is the body. The mana is the blood. The witch is the surgeon.

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
"I see more than others do because I know where to look."
—Saprazzan vizier

name: Buoyancy
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
flavor_text: Saprazzan merfolk become legged on land, but some find it quicker to bring the water with them.

name: Cateran Brute
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with mana value 2 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The Cateran guild prefers to call them "public relations."

name: Cateran Persuader
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with mana value 1 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Cavern Crawler
oracle_text:
Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
{R}: Cavern Crawler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Cave Sense
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

name: Ceremonial Guard
oracle_text: When Ceremonial Guard attacks or blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
flavor_text:
"These guards are the most disciplined military unit in the city. They couldn't fight their way out of a broom closet, but they've got discipline."
—Gerrard, to Sisay

name: Charm Peddler
oracle_text: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Cho-Manno's Blessing
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
As Cho-Manno's Blessing enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Cho-Manno's Blessing.

name: Cloud Sprite
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Cloud Sprite can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: The delicate sprites carry messages for Saprazzans, but they refuse to land in Mercadia City's filthy markets.

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text:
"Your attack has been rendered harmless. It is, however, quite pretty."
—Saprazzan vizier

name: Crash
oracle_text:
You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: Gerrard shook his head as the ground rushed to meet him. "This," he thought, "is not the start I was hoping for."

name: Crossbow Infantry
oracle_text: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: The crossbow is the ideal weapon for the lazy Mercadians: just point and shoot.

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"Eye of twilight, give us sight.
Take our offer, give us might.
Make our power tears of night."

name: Darting Merfolk
oracle_text: {U}: Return Darting Merfolk to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: You might as well try to catch water with a net.

name: Deadly Insect
oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: With his newfound sense of self-importance, Squee set his sights on ever-bigger bugs.

name: Deepwood Drummer
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: His drums echo Deepwood's heartbeat.

name: Deepwood Ghoul
oracle_text: Pay 2 life: Regenerate Deepwood Ghoul.
flavor_text: They feed on the living to stay undead.

name: Deepwood Wolverine
oracle_text: Whenever Deepwood Wolverine becomes blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The jhovalls are depleting its food sources, the Mercadians are eroding its home, and you're wondering why it's angry?

name: Dehydration
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text:
"You say Saprazzo is a city built on water? I hope they have enough to wash the dust from my throat."
—Sisay

name: Devout Witness
oracle_text: {1}{W}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: The Cho-Arrim fought Mercadia's decadence with more than just swords.

name: Diplomatic Immunity
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Shroud (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Enchanted creature has shroud.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
The scepter of power is fragile in a calloused hand.
—Cho-Arrim saying

name: Drake Hatchling
oracle_text:
Flying
{U}: Drake Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: There is beauty in the space between learning to fly and taking it for granted.

name: Ferocity
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"You lot go on ahead. I'll keep killing them until it sticks."
—Tahngarth

name: Flailing Soldier
oracle_text:
{1}: Flailing Soldier gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
{1}: Flailing Soldier gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

name: Flaming Sword
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
flavor_text:
"It's not Talruum crystal, but I must admit—it gets the job done."
—Tahngarth

name: Fresh Volunteers
flavor_text: Every Cho-Arrim villager is a potential warrior; when they are called, they abandon their peaceful way of life and take up arms to defend it.

name: Furious Assault
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, Furious Assault deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"Does it burn, Saprazzan? Do you wish you had never raised arms against us?"
—Kyren overseer

name: Gerrard's Irregulars
oracle_text: Trample, haste
flavor_text: Had Gerrard realized he'd end up fighting against them, he might not have trained them so well.

name: Giant Caterpillar
oracle_text: {G}, Sacrifice Giant Caterpillar: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token with flying named Butterfly at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Hickory Woodlot
oracle_text:
Hickory Woodlot enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it.
{T}, Remove a depletion counter from Hickory Woodlot: Add {G}{G}. If there are no depletion counters on Hickory Woodlot, sacrifice it.

name: Highway Robber
oracle_text: When Highway Robber enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Tonight, madam, it's your money *and* your life."

name: Hoodwink
oracle_text: Return target artifact, enchantment, or land to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: The youths of Rishada's marketplace are always ready for a quick footrace.

name: Horned Troll
oracle_text: {G}: Regenerate Horned Troll.
flavor_text:
"If I says it's a troll, it's a troll. Goblins is always right in Mercadia."
—Squee

name: Howling Wolf
oracle_text: When Howling Wolf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Howling Wolf, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Insubordination
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, Insubordination deals 2 damage to that player unless that creature attacked this turn.

name: Inviolability
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature.
flavor_text: A soldier's faith is magic strong enough to protect against any blade.

name: Kris Mage
oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Kris Mage deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Her blade draws blood without ever touching its target.

name: Kyren Glider
oracle_text:
Flying
Kyren Glider can't block.
flavor_text: Mercadia's Kyren goblins are the opposite of Dominarian goblins: they're smart and cowardly.

name: Kyren Sniper
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Kyren Sniper deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Kyren goblins always act behind the scenes—even in battle.

name: Land Grant
oracle_text:
If you have no land cards in hand, you may reveal your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Search your library for a Forest card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Lightning Hounds
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: Quick enough to avoid jhovalls when alone and fierce enough to attack them in packs, the hounds were as at home in the mountains as the Mercadians were atop theirs.

name: Lunge
oracle_text: Lunge deals 2 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Cho-Arrim righteousness was no match for Benalish combat training.

name: Maggot Therapy
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-2.
flavor_text:
"If this is the cure, I'd hate to see the disease."
—Orim

name: Misshapen Fiend
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: You'd scarcely believe they could fly until they drop out of the sky onto you.

name: Misstep
oracle_text: Creatures target player controls don't untap during that player's next untap step.
flavor_text:
The feet have no eyes.
—Saprazzan saying

name: Moment of Silence
oracle_text: Target player skips their next combat phase this turn.
flavor_text: The silence commemorates not those who've died, but those about to.

name: Muzzle
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
Clenched teeth do not bite.
—Cho-Arrim saying

name: Nightwind Glider
oracle_text: Flying, protection from black
flavor_text: Once you learn to float on the shadows, you'll never fear them again.

name: Orim's Cure
oracle_text:
If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

name: Peat Bog
oracle_text:
Peat Bog enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it.
{T}, Remove a depletion counter from Peat Bog: Add {B}{B}. If there are no depletion counters on Peat Bog, sacrifice it.

name: Pious Warrior
oracle_text: Whenever Pious Warrior is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: The Cho-Arrim make no distinction between healers and soldiers.

name: Port Inspector
oracle_text: Whenever Port Inspector becomes blocked, you may look at defending player's hand.
flavor_text: "There may be a few minor additional fees, levies, duties, surtaxes, tariffs, imposts, tolls . . . ."

name: Ramosian Lieutenant
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "Give me your hand and I will give you victory."

name: Ramosian Rally
oracle_text:
If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Ramosian Sergeant
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with mana value 2 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Her commands are part rallying cry, part sermon, and wholly undeniable.

name: Rampart Crawler
oracle_text: Rampart Crawler can't be blocked by Walls.
flavor_text:
"Not even the magistrate in his lofty tower is out of our reach."
—Cateran overlord

name: Remote Farm
oracle_text:
Remote Farm enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it.
{T}, Remove a depletion counter from Remote Farm: Add {W}{W}. If there are no depletion counters on Remote Farm, sacrifice it.

name: Revered Elder
oracle_text: {1}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Revered Elder this turn.
flavor_text: The Cho-Arrim worship life and revere those who've experienced it longest.

name: Rishadan Airship
oracle_text:
Flying
Rishadan Airship can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: The view is truly spectacular—as long as you don't look at Rishada itself.

name: Rishadan Cutpurse
oracle_text: When Rishadan Cutpurse enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent unless they pay {1}.
flavor_text:
The bigger the purse, the greater the fool.
—Rishadan saying

name: Rouse
oracle_text:
If you control a Swamp, you may pay 2 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Rushwood Dryad
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: Rushwood is a living jewel that reflects its dwellers' hearts.

name: Rushwood Herbalist
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text: When generals gather their armies, healers gather their herbs.

name: Sacred Prey
oracle_text: Whenever Sacred Prey becomes blocked, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: To see one is a good omen to the Cho-Arrim.

name: Sandstone Needle
oracle_text:
Sandstone Needle enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it.
{T}, Remove a depletion counter from Sandstone Needle: Add {R}{R}. If there are no depletion counters on Sandstone Needle, sacrifice it.

name: Saprazzan Outrigger
oracle_text: When Saprazzan Outrigger attacks or blocks, put it on top of its owner's library at end of combat.
flavor_text: The Saprazzans excel at both tactics: hit *and* run.

name: Saprazzan Raider
oracle_text: When Saprazzan Raider becomes blocked, return it to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Some quick dagger work and then back to the sea—that's the Saprazzan way.

name: Saprazzan Skerry
oracle_text:
Saprazzan Skerry enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it.
{T}, Remove a depletion counter from Saprazzan Skerry: Add {U}{U}. If there are no depletion counters on Saprazzan Skerry, sacrifice it.

name: Sever Soul
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text:
"With the proper tools, even the Great River can be dammed."
—Ta-Spon, Cho-Arrim executioner

name: Shock Troops
oracle_text: Sacrifice Shock Troops: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: When goblins blow themselves up, it's called stupidity. When humans do, it's called heroism.

name: Silverglade Elemental
oracle_text: When Silverglade Elemental enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Sizzle
oracle_text: Sizzle deals 3 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: Explosions ripped through the ship overhead, and those unfortunate enough to be directly below scrambled to find cover.

name: Skulking Fugitive
oracle_text: When Skulking Fugitive becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor_text: In the Cateran guild, being caught is a capital offense.

name: Snorting Gahr
oracle_text: Whenever Snorting Gahr becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: There's little advantage to surprising the gahr.

name: Snuff Out
oracle_text:
If you control a Swamp, you may pay 4 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: Squee watched his Kyren cousins fall with a mixture of sympathy and relief.

name: Soothing Balm
oracle_text: Target player gains 5 life.
flavor_text: Orim taught Ta-Karnst and the other Cho-Arrim healers a far less invasive method of healing.

name: Soul Channeling
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Pay 2 life: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor_text: Driven by masters more terrible than the Mercadians could imagine, the dark overseers would pay any price to keep their shipwrights working.

name: Specter's Wail
oracle_text: Target player discards a card at random.
flavor_text: As he gritted his teeth to focus through the pain, Tahngarth glanced at Takara. She seemed completely unaffected.

name: Spidersilk Armor
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 and have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It hardly weighs anything, but it takes all day to remove.

name: Squall
oracle_text: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.
flavor_text: The air that holds them aloft can just as easily put them down.

name: Steadfast Guard
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: The Mercadians were prepared for the guard, but the guard was even more prepared for the Mercadians.

name: Stinging Barrier
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{U}, {T}: Stinging Barrier deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: The return of Ramos was foretold by devastating natural disasters and unnatural storms.

name: Task Force
oracle_text: Whenever Task Force becomes the target of a spell or ability, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: They are the reflection of Rushwood's glow on the edge of a wooden sword.

name: Thermal Glider
oracle_text: Flying, protection from red
flavor_text:
"The Mercadians are too busy looking down on us to see us coming."
—Cho-Arrim rebel

name: Thunderclap
oracle_text:
You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Thunderclap deals 3 damage to target creature.

name: Tidal Bore
oracle_text:
You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
You may tap or untap target creature.
flavor_text: The dry riverbed became a raging torrent, and the Cho-Arrim claimed their prize.

name: Tiger Claws
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.
flavor_text: Cho-Arrim martial artists emulate the beasts of their home.

name: Tranquility
oracle_text: Destroy all enchantments.
flavor_text: Sisay had been restored to her place on the ship, the Legacy had been recovered, and the *Weatherlight* was sailing home to Dominaria. Gerrard focused on the debts he'd settled . . . and on those he'd soon collect.

name: Tremor
oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text: Without a word, Gerrard and Sisay ran deeper into the mountain. Neither of them intended to leave Mercadia without the *Weatherlight* and its crew.

name: Undertaker
oracle_text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The weight of death is heavy but not immovable.

name: Vendetta
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor_text: Starke knew the voice was Takara's, but the venom was Volrath's.

name: Venomous Dragonfly
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Venomous Dragonfly blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
flavor_text: A pretty little death is still death.

name: Vine Trellis
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: "We protect our own with our own."

name: Wall of Distortion
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{2}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: It reflects only nightmares.

name: Waterfront Bouncer
oracle_text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Closing time comes earlier to some than to others.

name: Wild Jhovall
flavor_text: Jhovalls sharpen their claws on trees—or on Mercadians, if no trees are handy.
